content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols calls for japanese size 8/0 5 0 mm hook **yarn ** * color a approx 25g 26 875 meters * color b approx 90g 96 75 meters **note ** the website and pdf include two different patterns this is the entry for the beige bag bag b on the right in the photos on the website the entry for the blue and brown bag bag a is here 2 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/amikomo2008/1 pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo-1-nukunuku-rover-bag-a
